title: The Size Of The Universe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/5/17
itunes:title: The Size Of The Universe - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/5/17
description:
George Noory and astronomer Bob Berman discuss their theories on the actual size of the universe and how to explain the Big Bang Theory.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
